about_the_game:
Welcome to Dead Past 8 - the ultimate test of survival in a world overrun by the undead!

In the year 2023, the world as you knew it has crumbled, and humanity's last hope rests on an island that was once a bustling tourist destination. This open-world island paradise has become your nightmare, as it's now infested with hordes of relentless zombies. But there's a twist - when the sun dips below the horizon, the undead become more cunning, stronger, and much deadlier But More Rewarding once defeated. Can you survive the night and defend your camp against your enemies?

Explore a Post-Apocalyptic Paradise: Roam freely through a beautifully recreated tourist trap turned zombie-infested playground. From sandy beaches to abandoned houses, every corner of the island tells a story of the past, and it's your job to unveil the mystery.

Day and Night Survival: Experience the heart-pounding intensity as you face off against two different types of terror. During the day, scavenge for supplies, build fortifications, and form alliances with other survivors. But as night falls, brace yourself for an escalating challenge, as the zombies become more cunning and ferocious. Can you make it through until dawn?

Craft and Customize: Craft essential tools and weapons to stay one step ahead of the undead horde. Modify your gear, Build your shelter, and adapt your strategies to face the evolving threat. Your survival depends on your ability to outthink and outgun the zombies as well as other players.

Cooperative Play: Team up with friends on the island. Cooperate to take down zombies, share resources, and build a thriving community. But be cautious, trust is a scarce resource in this unforgiving world.

Stunning Visuals and Immersive Sound: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning and hauntingly atmospheric world. The island's richly detailed environments and eerie sounds will keep you on edge, whether you're exploring during the day or fighting for your life at night.

Compete and Conquer: Test your skills against other players in thrilling a PvP World. Prove you're the ultimate survivor by outlasting not only the undead but also your fellow competitors.

Dead Past 8 is the ultimate multiplayer zombie survival experience, where the past collides with a nightmarish present. Will you rise above the chaos and unveil the island's secrets, or become just another victim of the Dead Past? The sun is setting, and the undead are on the prowl. Can you survive past 8 pm?

Survive the night. Survive the Dead.

Are you ready for the ultimate zombie survival challenge? Dive into Dead Past 8 now!

content_descriptors.notes: May contain Partial Nudity, Gore, Violence, Blood through out gameplay.

name: Dead Past 8

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8th gen or Ryzen 5 2nd gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 8GB/AMD rx 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Hard Drive required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10th gen or Ryzen 7 3nd gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080 11GB/AMD rx 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Hard Drive required

short_description: Dead Past 8 - Survive zombies and unravel island mysteries in this 2023 open-world horror. By day, explore, craft and harvest. After the sun dips below the horizon face stronger, cunning undead. Team up, adapt, and confront the nightmarish challenge. Can you survive "Dead Past 8"?
